name: Freedom of Severn & Solent Rover (3 in 7 or 8 in 15)
description:
FREEDOM OF SEVERN & SOLENT ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for either any 3 days in 7 days or any 8 days in 15 days. The area extends from Great Malvern and Worcester in the north to 
      Weymouth and Portsmouth in the south and from Cardiff, Tiverton Parkway and Axminster in the west to Swindon in the east and encompasses Bristol, Salisbury and Southampton.
